Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh and Sri Lanka are equal rivals, and it's hard to explain why Silverwood's team was given such a serious preference.
The bookmakers didn't do the right thing by giving Sri Lanka a noticeable advantage.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh is highly motivated today because the winner of the face-to-face confrontation with Sri Lanka goes to the playoffs.
Others: The economic crisis in Sri Lanka may affect the team's performance.
The odds do not reflect the real state of affairs.
